dtliExcerpt: Daniel Craig and Ruth Negga are magnetic in this stripped-down, 105-minute 'Macbeth' that cuts through Shakespeare's poetry like a sword.
bwwExcerpt: Craig, a fine actor in the past, is a victim of all the directing detritus. Gold seems to have told 007 and company to act detached and indifferent in this oh-so-violent and propulsive of works. Kings and murderers sound like Iowans discussing soybeans.
